title: (x) Blocky connected script 'State of Play' magazine title - FIG {Stephen}
content:
Did a search on here and ran it through WTF, but didn't get anything. I'm pretty sure it's a font as it's used throughout the magazine.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829232358im_/http:/typophile.com/files/stateofplay_4569.jpg)

Image from [State of Play](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829232358/http:/www.stateofplayzine.com/).

Thanks in advance for any ideas :)
author: lunasoleil

comments.content:
In addition the magazine text font (at least the website font) is [Jones](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829232358/http:/www.t26.com/fonts/409-Jones).

momo  
––  
All Good Cretins Go To Heaven
